[[inst_b_iot]]
==== B.IOT

*Syntax:* B.IOT [SrcTile0<.reuse>, SrcTile1<.reuse>],  group=1, ->DstTile<RegSrc>

*Description:* Block I/O: performs input/output operations at block level.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_b_iot.svg[B.IOT encoding,width=800]

*Group:* CMD/BLOCK_IO
